column3: News;Sihanoukville: At around 10 am on March 1
column5: a fire broke out in a Chinese-owned apartment  building in Sangkat No 3 in front of Sihanoukville Port.------According to the police
column6: the fire broke out from a cooker on the ground floor
column7: and people with fire extinguishers were able to control it. Luckily they prevented the fire spreading and there were no casualties. ------https://kbn.news/archives/117761
